activities: Our services include the collection of personal information required for employment, including personal demographic information, identification, tax related information, emergency contacts, information required for bank direct deposit, and information required to procure health and related insurance, and any other information required by the services our clients extended to their employees.
personaldata: Client and client's employee data, this data is not manually processed.
recoursemech: Efficient Forms will utilize EU Data Protection Authorities for independent dispute resolution.
